forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze before 3am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 72. South wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Haze then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze between 9am and 11am, then haze and scattered rain showers between 11am and 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 80 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 61. West northwest wind 3 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 8am, then scattered showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 76. North northeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

Southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
